cluster_information.name: Microwave Oven Mode
cluster_information.description: This cluster is derived from the Mode Base cluster, defining additional mode tags and namespaced enumerated values for Microwave Oven devices.

0x0000.name: SupportedModes
0x0000.description: Exactly one entry in the SupportedModes attribute SHALL include the Normal mode tag in the ModeTags field.

0x4001.name: Defrost
0x4001.summary: A mode optimized for defrosting foods

mode_constraints.required_modes: Exactly one entry in the SupportedModes attribute SHALL include the Normal mode tag in the ModeTags field.
mode_constraints.mutual_exclusion: The Normal and Defrost mode tags are mutually exclusive and SHALL NOT both be used together in a mode's ModeTags.
